meanings: (예감·추측 등이) be right, prove right, come true (=들어맞다)
(얻어맞다) be hit, be struck, (뺨을) be slapped, (여러 차례) be beaten
(총·벼락 등을) be hit (by), (총을) be shot, (벼락을) be struck

vlive.korean: 맞는... Only few fit... 듣기 View video BTS : BTS Live : 흑발 자랑 라이브😍

이 방법이 맞는 거겠죠? This is the right way, isn't it? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 적어도 난 진짜 연애중이야 #남사친이_불편해졌다 #삼각관계 [리얼:타임:러브2] EP5

vlive.english: "'Secret Live' at a kids cafe." What if I get hit by the kids at a kids cafe?
